entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 23 April 2023
